SELECT POP_SQ ,POP_NM ,POP_CONT ,BEGIN_DTTM ,END_DTTM ,ACTIVE_YN ,LNK_YN ,LNK_URL ,POP_IMG_FILE_NM ,POP_IMG_PATH ,POP_TP ,STAT ,CASE STAT WHEN '001' THEN '노출중' WHEN '002' THEN '노출중지' WHEN '003' THEN '대기중' WHEN '004' THEN '삭제' END STAT_NM ,DEL_ADM_EMAIL ,DEL_RSN ,DATE_FORMAT(REG_DTTM, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%I') AS REG_DTTM ,DATE_FORMAT(UPT_DTTM, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%I') AS UPT_DTTM ,DEL_DTTM ,REG_ADM_SQ ,UPT_ADM_SQ ,DEL_ADM_SQ ,BTBS_SQ FROM TB_POP WHERE 1=1 AND STAT != '004'

AND REG_DTTM BETWEEN CONCAT(#{R_FROMDT},'000000') AND CONCAT(#{R_TODT},'235959')
ORDER BY ${orderBy} LIMIT ${R_PAGE} , ${R_ROW}

AND POP_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{R_KEYWORD},'%')
